Posted By: NecroticNobody (9/23/2010 6:15:45 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Venser is probably the only one who can use his first ability to 'cleanse' -1/-1 counters of your creatures, a great deal consider that you don't see many cards that can do this.
  
   
And here's a possible combo for Elspeth Tirel and Venser working together, with Elspeth creating tokens the first time in the turn, then let Venser exile her, returning her with 4 loyalty couners again. You can keep doing this each turn till you're satisfied withthe number of soldier tokens at your command, and they also act as your shield against constant har\*\*\*ment, three soldiers each turn to block your opponent's desperate \*\*\*ault.
  
   
When you felt you had enough, proliferate or wait a turn for Elspeth to charge up, have Venser phase himself out of the game before letting Elspeth clean the board, while he comes back with his 3 counters. Sound strategy, bet most players didn't think of that but it works.
  
   
Oh, and um, Bathory, care to explain your issues with 'arms'? '''>\_>'''
  
(lol)
posts.html:
Venser is probably the only one who can use his first ability to 'cleanse' -1/-1 counters of your creatures, a great deal consider that you don't see many cards that can do this.

And here's a possible combo for Elspeth Tirel and Venser working together, with Elspeth creating tokens the first time in the turn, then let Venser exile her, returning her with 4 loyalty couners again. You can keep doing this each turn till you're satisfied withthe number of soldier tokens at your command, and they also act as your shield against constant har***ment, three soldiers each turn to block your opponent's desperate ***ault.

When you felt you had enough, proliferate or wait a turn for Elspeth to charge up, have Venser phase himself out of the game before letting Elspeth clean the board, while he comes back with his 3 counters. Sound strategy, bet most players didn't think of that but it works.

Oh, and um, Bathory, care to explain your issues with 'arms'? '''>_>'''
(lol)

Posted By: Htoth3izzO (9/25/2010 5:40:48 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Got him last night in a constructed tourny.  
Everything works with this guy!  
  
The first ability: It removes poison counters, brings another landfall effect, untaps creatures, and other plenty of combos  
  
Second ability....Pump a infection creature....  
  
Third ability...An absolutely fun ultimate, pay a spell to do something to your benefit, exile something for free. Perfect for getting rid of [grafted exoskeleton](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=grafted exoskeleton) and a creature attached to it  
  
Then eventually while you are controlling everything: TWO Emblems out!
posts.html:
Got him last night in a constructed tourny.
Everything works with this guy!

The first ability: It removes poison counters, brings another landfall effect, untaps creatures, and other plenty of combos

Second ability....Pump a infection creature....

Third ability...An absolutely fun ultimate, pay a spell to do something to your benefit, exile something for free. Perfect for getting rid of grafted exoskeleton and a creature attached to it

Then eventually while you are controlling everything: TWO Emblems out!

dear venser, remember me? we met in the prerelease couple of weeks ago, yeah you hide my [Sunblast Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sunblast Angel) and six others that night.   
  
regarding to your ability, i'm really interested to hire you in my blue-with company. I offer you a position as an exiler. We have a plenty of facilities that can support your work, as well as [Inexorable Tide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inexorable Tide), [Contagion Engine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Contagion Engine) and we will also provide you with a white spell life-protected insurance. I hope you are interested with my offers.  
  
looking forward to see you in my next booster bock. thanks.  
regards

posts.post_content: i love him. Venser is a) an awesome character that's gonna kick new phyrexia in the face b) an epic planeswalker. His -1 ability is excellent for a final infect charge from your creatures, and his +2 combos nicely with the trigons. pay 6 mana of one color to replenish my 3 charge counters? How about i bounce them and pump up my planeswalker for 2. I don't even need to talk about his ultimate, because anyone who can't figure out a good use for it doesn't know how to play MTG well enough to deserve such an awesome card. I opened him in a draft yesterday and he's totally epic.
